## IMock.mode property

The current mode, configured either by a call to [setMode](./kassette.imock.setmode.md)<!-- -->, or by [the global setting](./kassette.cliconfigurationspec.mode.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly mode: Mode;
```
